attributes.action: Pursue the proposed Analog Radio Switch-Off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The opposing 'do not turn off FM' petition gives no scope to those people who endorse the policy of rationalising the way we broadcast our radio channels within the UK. The existing radio broadcasting methods are wasteful of energy and bandwidth. With very little expenditure, the loss of FM can be replaced with digital systems with more choice and better quality.
